actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the reinstatement and validation of United States oil and gas lease numbered W-46102.

summary.text: Reinstates and extends a specified U.S. oil and gas lease subject to payment of accrued rental for such lease by the last recordholder of such lease.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the reinstatement and validation of United States oil and gas lease numbered W-46102.
